name: SuperNova Dragon
description: You play as a dragon who finds her fellow dragons accidentally poisoned by some bad tea at a tea party hosted by a careless witch.  With them immobile, it is up to you to help create a potion to heal the dragons and take on their responsibilities in the meantime. Change your dragon breath with potions, help creatures in need, and defeat hostile enemies. (The game is still in development and going through bug fixes)
